text: Hala Sophia Ayala (born 1973) is an American cybersecurity specialist and politician. She represented the 51st district in the Virginia House of Delegates from 2018 to 2022. She was the unsuccessful Democratic nominee for Lieutenant Governor of Virginia in the 2021 election, losing to Republican Winsome Sears."Virginia Del. Hala Ayala announces bid for lieutenant governor," by Antonio Olivo, The Washington Post, July 14, 2020, retrieved July 22, 2020 ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Virginia
title: Hala Ayala
